content.title: Saur Sujala Yojana
content.department: Chhattisgarh State Renewable Energy Development Agency (CREDA)
content.details: The Saur Sujala Yojana is to set up solar irrigation pumps for the irrigation needs of the farmers. The scheme has been started on November 01, 2016 with the aim of empowering the farmers by providing irrigation pumps to the farmers at subsidized rates. The use of solar pump will help in increasing agricultural production in the state as well as conservation and augmentation of ground water and strengthening the rural economy. Under the plan, there is a provision for setting up solar pumps of 03 H.P. and 05 H.P. capacity.
benefits: Cow dung and buffalo cattle breeders will be purchased by the government at the rate of Rs.2/- per kg.
To increase the income of cattle herders.
Making organic fertilizers easily available at the local level.
eligibility: Small/medium/large-scale farmers are eligible to apply for this scheme.
The farmer should be a resident of Chhattisgarh State.
content.application_process: The first applicants have to open the official Website. Click on 'Saur Sujala Yojana Online Apply'. In the next window select the scheme name. Fill out the required details. Provide the bank details and Submit.
documents_required: It is mandatory for the beneficiary to have agricultural land and water source (borewell, well, river/stream etc.) in his own name.
Khasra/area of land and attested map of the workplace.

faqs.question: What is Saur Sujala Yojana?
faqs.answer: The Saur Sujala Yojana is to set up solar irrigation pumps for the irrigation needs of the farmers.

faqs.question: When did this scheme start?
faqs.answer: The scheme has been started on November 01, 2016.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: Small/medium/large-scale farmers are eligible to apply for this scheme. The farmer should be a resident of Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: Can people from other states also apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No. This scheme is only for Resident Of Chhattisgarh.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Cow dung and buffalo cattle breeders will be purchased by the government at the rate of Rs.2/- per kg. To increase the income of cattle herders. Creation of new employment opportunities. Making organic fertilizers easily available at the local level.

faqs.question: Through which mode can applicants apply?
faqs.answer: Applicants can apply Online and offline modes both.

faqs.question: How to apply through offline mode?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to get the application form for Saur Sujala Yojana from there or download it from the official website. Fill out the required details. Attach the required documents. Submit the application with documents at Agriculture Department.

faqs.question: What are the required documents?
faqs.answer: Agricultural land papers, Address proof, Aadhaar Card, Photocopy of caste certificate, Map of the workplace, Amount of processing fee, Photographs of the applicant.
